Interface SettingsPanelWithData

All Superinterfaces:
SettingData, SettingsPanel
public interface SettingsPanelWithData extends SettingsPanel, SettingData
Represents a settings panel built using SettingsPanelBuilder displayed in Burp's Settings dialog, which has associated data.
